name: InfiniteJuggle
description:
This is a clicker game. Its a pretty addictive game (for me at least).

Achievements:

That's a big family - buy 15 balls

1 MILLION!?!?!? - achieve 1 million dollars

50 MILIONS?! Pathetic... - achieve 50 million dollars

That's a shiny one - Buy a big ball

Good Friend :0 - Buy an AutoMoneyGuy

YOU ARE SUPA CRAZY! - (SECRET)

Perfect 1000 ;} - achieve exactly 1000 dollars

1 - Decrease music volume

2 - Increase music volume

!!!!PLEASE DO NOT SPAM TOO FAST THE UPGRADE BUTTONS, THEY WILL NOT BE APPLIED BECAUSE THEY DIDN'T PROCCESED THE COMMAND!!!!
